sn12.44:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you the origin and ending of the world.
sn12.44:4.3: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
sn12.44:5.1: “And what, mendicants, is the origin of the world?
sn12.44:5.2: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights.
sn12.44:5.3: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn12.44:5.4: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn12.44:5.5: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn12.44:5.6: Craving is a condition for grasping.
sn12.44:5.7: Grasping is a condition for future existence.
sn12.44:5.8: Future existence is a condition for rebirth.
sn12.44:5.9: Rebirth is a condition that gives rise to old age and death, sorrow, crying, pain, sadness, and distress.
sn12.44:5.10: This is the origin of the world.
sn12.44:6.1: Ear consciousness arises dependent on the ear and sounds. …
sn12.44:6.2: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the nose and smells. …
sn12.44:6.3: Tongue consciousness arises dependent on the tongue and tastes. …
sn12.44:6.4: Body consciousness arises dependent on the body and touches. …
sn12.44:6.5: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and phenomena.
sn12.44:6.6: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn12.44:6.7: Contact is a condition for feeling. …
sn12.44:6.8: Rebirth is a condition that gives rise to old age and death, sorrow, crying, pain, sadness, and distress.
sn12.44:6.9: This is the origin of the world.
sn12.44:7.1: And what is the ending of the world?
sn12.44:7.2: Eye consciousness arises dependent on the eye and sights.
sn12.44:7.3: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn12.44:7.4: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn12.44:7.5: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn12.44:7.6: When that craving fades away and ceases with nothing left over, grasping ceases.
sn12.44:7.7: When grasping ceases, future existence ceases. …
sn12.44:7.8: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn12.44:7.9: This is the ending of the world.

sn12.44:8.2: Nose consciousness arises dependent on the nose and smells. …
sn12.44:8.3: Tongue consciousness arises dependent on the tongue and tastes. …
sn12.44:8.4: Body consciousness arises dependent on the body and touches. …
sn12.44:8.5: Mind consciousness arises dependent on the mind and phenomena.
sn12.44:8.6: The meeting of the three is contact.
sn12.44:8.7: Contact is a condition for feeling.
sn12.44:8.8: Feeling is a condition for craving.
sn12.44:8.9: When that craving fades away and ceases with nothing left over, grasping ceases.

sn12.44:8.11: That is how this entire mass of suffering ceases.
sn12.44:8.12: This is the ending of the world.”
